description.@en: Your chanted prayer fills the hearts of your friends and allies, as they are emboldened by His blessing.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, select a number of allies equal to your [FB]. Providing you can see your allies, they gain +9 Damage Threshold. This Magick requires Concentration.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but triple the Duration.

criticalFailure.@en: The fabric of the standard is torn to shreds before your very eyes, as the eagle takes shape into a great Abyssal monstrosity, before flying away. A number of allies who see this, equal to your [FB], are made a victim of Terror.

reagents.@en: A standard with an eagle upon it, held aloft
